hero.title: Live vital. In balance.
hero.subtitleSuffix: in balance — a simple recipe for sustainable results.

items.title: Beyond calorie counting
items.body: Insulin-smart meal design and meal breaks tame cravings; decisions get easier.

items.title: Steady energy
items.body: Low glycemic load plus protein & fiber keep glucose flatter; optional CGM adds feedback.

items.title: Short & effective
items.body: Activity that sticks: mobility, short strength pulses, and NEAT cues keep insulin sensitivity high.

toolkit.title: Toolkit across six modules
bullets: Insulin regulation (glycemic load ↓, protein & fiber ↑, clear meal breaks)
Intermittent fasting (12:12 → 14:10 → 16:8 progression based on context)
Nutrition: insulin-smart meal design, joy in cooking
Activity: short strength pulses, mobility & NEAT you’ll actually do
Mindfulness & sleep: dial stress down, recovery up
Environment: plan kitchen, routines, social moments

cgmKickstart.title: 14-day CGM kickstart
cgmKickstart.disclaimer: Awareness, not forever-tracking. Get medical clearance if needed.

offersTeaser.title: Your path to transformation

offersTeaser.supporting: Every engagement starts with a clarity call and ends with measurable rituals.

deliverables: Rhythm plan covering fasting & meal design

pillars.title: The four pillars of Livalance
pillars.description: We combine sleep, nutrition, activity, and Mindfulness to craft a rhythm that respects your real life.

sleep.title: Sleep
sleep.body: Circadian rhythms, evening rituals, and light hygiene to fuel deeper rest.
focus: Build sleep pressure through daylight & activity
Wind-down structures that soothe the nervous system

nutrition.title: Nutrition
nutrition.body: Glucose-friendly plates, protein builders, and flexible prep templates.

activity.title: Activity
activity.body: Activity stays playful: mobility, power pulses, and NEAT habits for dense schedules.
focus: Compact strength pulses without gym machines
NEAT tricks: walk & talk, stairs, micro-snacks

mindfulness.title: Mindfulness
mindfulness.body: Tools to counter overload: breathwork, journaling, and nervous system care.

programSection.title: Integrated workshops & programmes
programSection.description: We blend sensor-led experiments, live sessions, habit design, and team communication into one seamless flow.
programSection.supporting: Every engagement starts with a shared architecture call and ends with a crystal-clear transfer plan.

bundles.name: Focus Sprint
bundles.description: Two-week intensive with CGM, daily micro nudges, and a synthesis workshop.

bundles.name: Team Journey
bundles.description: Four to six week hybrid journey including leader enablement, async pulses, and reporting.

bundles.name: Season Reset
bundles.description: Quarterly refresh workshops featuring pillar-specific experiments and follow-ups.

programSection.note: All programmes run in German or English and scale with your team size.

socialProof.title: Proof from everyday routines
socialProof.description: Figures are drawn from anonymised check-ins, CGM windows, and HRV reports — not marketing claims.
logos: Afternoon snacking impulses drop for 9 out of 10 participants.
Average sleep score rises by +12 points (Whoop/Oura benchmarks).
Teams log two extra focus blocks per day after four weeks.

metrics.label: feel fewer energy dips after 4 weeks

items.question: Why focus on insulin over calorie counting?
items.answer: Managing insulin makes appetite and choices easier. Energy balance still matters, but decisions feel lighter.

items.question: Is IF mandatory?
items.answer: No. We start pragmatically (e.g., 12:12) and adjust windows to daily life, cycle, and stress.

items.question: Do I need a CGM?
items.answer: Optional for 14 days to spot patterns. After that, routines and check-ins are enough.

finalCta.title: Start with clarity
finalCta.subtitle: Book your intro call and get a micro-plan for nutrition, sleep, activity, and Mindfulness.

articles.title: Insights
articles.intro: Articles, scripts, and data summaries to support team wellbeing and personal routines.

workshopsPage.heroSubtitle: Sleep, nutrition, activity & mindfulness workshops as your path to transformation. In-person or remote formats flex to your rhythm and keep the gains actionable.
workshopsPage.heroTagline: Choose the workshop that unlocks your next step.
workshopsPage.flowDescription: We guide you from preparation to transfer with clear owners for every milestone.
workshopsPage.formatsDescription: Combine formats and tailor them to your calendar cadence.
workshopsPage.pricingNote: Pricing depends on team size and support level. Let’s explore what you need.
workshopsPage.disclaimer: Disclaimer: Livalance is not a substitute for medical diagnosis or treatment.

aboutPage.heroSubtitle: We blend sports science, nutrition, and coaching to make healthy routines stick.
aboutPage.mission: Make vitality the default — with programmes that respect schedules and measure outcomes.
aboutPage.story: Founded by athletes, coaches, and strategists who experienced energy as the bottleneck in startups, agencies, and remote teams.
aboutPage.approach: Analyses, workshops, and habit design combine into an iterative process. Every collaboration ends with clear metrics and follow-up.

pillarsPage.title: The Livalance pillars
pillarsPage.intro: Each pillar comes with its own frameworks, experiments, and resources. Together they form an adaptable wellbeing stack.

sleep.headline: Sleep
sleep.body: Circadian design, light and temperature routines, and evening rituals for deeper rest.
details: Chronotype + light audit plus temperature routines
Wind-down lab: breathwork, journaling, stimulus control
Sleep ops: HRV/wearable reviews to plan upgrades

nutrition.headline: Nutrition
nutrition.body: Sequencing, protein focus, meal design, and flexible prep templates.
details: Meal design: protein, fiber, and fat building blocks
Sequencing & satiety: soups, bitter greens, glucose-gentle treats
Prep sprints: shopping list, batch cooking, backup snacks

activity.headline: Activity
activity.body: Activity stays light: mobility, short strength bursts, and NEAT routines for packed days.
details: Mobility lab: 5-minute resets for hips, shoulders, spine
Strength pulses: 10–15 min stacks without a full gym
NEAT scoreboard: walk & talk, stairs, micro-sprints throughout the day

mindfulness.headline: Mindfulness
mindfulness.body: Down-regulation, breathwork, journaling, and focus rituals to counter overload.
details: Stress audit: nervous-system check and friction mapping
Breath & journaling: box breathing, CO2 work, gains & drains log
Focus rituals: intent setting in the morning, shutdown sequences at night

pillarsPage.conceptBody: Each pillar gets its own assessment, playbook, and experiments before we stitch everything into one weekly rhythm.
conceptBullets: Assess: chronotype, glucose, stress, and habit inventory
Design: modular 2–4 week experiments that compound
Ops: check-ins, reviews, and playbooks to keep routines measurable
pillarsPage.ctaBody: In the intro call we identify your biggest lever and show how the remaining pillars plug in.

booking.headline: Book instantly
booking.description: Powered by Cal.com — bilingual slots available.

items.quote: Short kettlebell blocks plus NEAT cues keep activity doable. Energy stays stable through launches.

items.quote: The CGM kickstart surfaced patterns I now manage without sensors. Sleep & focus both improved.
